author: SegmentLinking
body:
This PR introduces the new configuration described in the title. The configuration looks like this:
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/19be691a-dc9d-4fbe-b315-d0c50f19aacc)

The implementation utilizes already available `procModifier`s, and can be run with the `procModifier` sequence `alpaka,singleIterPatatrack,trackingLST,seedingLST`. Workflow 0.757 is being introduced to monitor this configuration.

As part of the validation, the `procModifier`s mentioned above have been tested separately and in their "allowed" combinations, and seem to be giving expected results. In any case, it would be good to test the following, previously introduced workflows:
- 0.75
- 0.751
- 0.753
- 0.754
- 0.755

Slides on this were presented at the [HLT Upgrade meeting of April 22nd](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1540225/#5-single-patatrack-iteration-w).

FYI @slava77
title: Introduce a single LST-seeded, CKF-building iteration based on Patatrack pixel tracks for Phase 2 HLT
